help.description: Get help for a single command or all of them.

createchannel.description: Create a single channel in the guild

createchannels.description: Create the maximum amount of channels in the guild

deletechannel.description: Delete a single channel in the guild

deletechannels.description: Delete all the channels in the guild

spamchannel.description: Spam a single channel in the guild

spamchannels.description: Spam random channels in the guild

banmember.description: Ban a member in the guild

banmembers.description: Ban all the members in the guild

kickmember.description: Ban a members in the guild

kickmembers.description: Kick all the members in the guild

givepermissions.description: Give administrator permissions to @everyone in the guild

createrole.description: Create a role in the guild

createroles.description: Create the maximum amount of roles in the guild

deleterole.description: Delete a role in the guild

deleteroles.description: Delete all the roles in the guild

createemoji.description: Create an emoji in the guild

createemojis.description: Create the maximum amount of emojis in the guild

deleteemoji.description: Delete an emoji in the guild

deleteemojis.description: Delete all the emojies in the guild

createsticker.description: Create a sticker in the guild

createstickers.description: Create the maximum amount of stickers in the guild
